# encode(to:)

**Instance Method**

Serializes a captured room to the specified encoder.

## Declaration

```swift
func encode(to encoder: any Encoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **encoder**: An object that the captured room serializes to.

## Serializing a captured room

- **CapturedRoom.AttributesCodableRepresentation**: A serializable set of details that describe an object in the room.
